text: Power Play is a 2003 American action film directed by Joseph Zito. Some action scenes were filmed in the city of Curitiba, Brazil. ==Cast== * Dylan Walsh * Alison Eastwood * Tobin Bell * Brixton Karnes ==Sources== ==Other websites== * Category:2003 action movies Category:2003 movies Category:American action movies Category:Movies directed by Joseph Zito
title: Power Play
